    • Method Detail

      • createStreamEncoder

        public StreamEncoder createStreamEncoder(java.lang.String file)
        Description copied from interface: LAMEOnJStdEncoder
        Creates a new MP3 stream encoder using the specified file as audio source.

        If the specified file is a WAV file, the header is processed and extracted data as number of channels, mono/stereo, and sample rate are used to set up the LAME encoder.

        Specified by:
        createStreamEncoder in interface LAMEOnJStdEncoder
        Parameters:
        file - the path of the audio source.
        Returns:
        a new MP3 stream encoder

      • createStreamEncoder

        public StreamEncoder createStreamEncoder(java.io.InputStream stream,
                                java.lang.String mime)
        Description copied from interface: LAMEOnJStdEncoder
        Creates a new MP3 stream encoder using the specified stream as audio source.

        MIME type may be specified, if specified current version only supports WAV (audio/wav, audio/wave, audio/x-wav), otherwise raw PCM is supposed.

        If WAV the header is processed as explained in LAMEOnJStdEncoder.createStreamEncoder(String)

        Specified by:
        createStreamEncoder in interface LAMEOnJStdEncoder
        Parameters:
        stream - the stream of the audio source.
        mime - the MIME type of the source. May be null (raw PCM).
        Returns:
        a new MP3 stream encoder

      • createGenericEncoder

        public GenericEncoder createGenericEncoder()
        Description copied from interface: LAMEOnJStdEncoder
        Creates a new generic MP3 stream encoder.

        If the specified file is a WAV file, the header is processed and extracted data as number of channels, mono/stereo, and sample rate are used to set up the LAME encoder.

        Specified by:
        createGenericEncoder in interface LAMEOnJStdEncoder
        Returns:
        a new MP3 stream encoder
